projects.name: Nim
projects.author: Meurig Beynon and Matthew Leeke
projects.description: A competitive two player strategy game.

projects.name: Therenim
projects.author: Meurig Beynon, Jonny Foss and Elizabeth Hudnott
projects.description: Nim game with musical accompaniment.  Make it go silent to win the game.

projects.name: Hex Colouring
projects.author: Jonny Foss and Meurig Beynon
projects.description: A puzzle game where you colour-in hexagons.

projects.name: Light Box
projects.author: Jonny Foss and Meurig Beynon
projects.description: Reflect a laser beam using mirrors.  Crashes in Google Chrome browser.

projects.name: Soundscape
projects.author: Elizabeth Hudnott
projects.description: Make your own musical instrument by following a tutorial.

projects.name: Piano
projects.author: Elizabeth Hudnott (pedagogical consultant Meg Beynon)
projects.description: Explore learning to play the piano and read music.

projects.name: Ratio
projects.author: Steve Russ, Meurig Beynon and Jonny Foss
projects.description: An exercise in building a construal to visualise ratio.

projects.name: Number Representation
projects.author: Meurig Beynon
projects.description: Learn about different number bases (such as binary) using number line visualizations.

projects.name: Triangles
projects.author: "Tuesday Team" (Nick Pope et al.) and Meurig Beynon

projects.name: Electrical Circuit
projects.author: Elizabeth Hudnott and Nick Pope
projects.description: Turn bulbs on and off and explore the wiring diagram.

projects.name: Shopping
projects.author: Meurig Beynon, Jonny Foss and Steve Russ

projects.name: Purse
projects.author: Meurig Beynon
projects.description: Learn the basics of construals by exploring taking money out of purse and putting it back again.

projects.name: Giving Change
projects.author: Meurig Beynon
projects.description: Explore giving change using a greedy coin selection method.

projects.name: Construing a Vending Machine From Scratch
projects.author: Meurig Beynon and Elizabeth Hudnott
projects.description: Learn to make something non-trivial from scratch.

projects.name: Matching
projects.author: Meurig Beynon
projects.description: Model of a mathematical problem where the task is to arrange marriages for 8 people subject to restrictions about who gets along well with who.

projects.name: Arduino Plug-in
projects.author: Nick Pope
projects.description: Extend JS-EDEN so that it can control an Arduino microcontroller.
